tool_description: Registrant Alert API (v2) lets you check which domains have been added or disposed of for the registrants you define as search criteria.
name: Domain Whois Registrant Alert v2
title: Domain Whois Registrant Alert v2

api_list.name: Simple registrant alert search
api_list.description: Basic search requires less configuration and produces broader results. The output includes domains having all the include terms and none of the exclude terms any of the registrant data fields. For further details, see "Simple search docs" under "Overview".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whoisapi-domain-whois-registrant-alert-v2-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whoisapi-domain-whois-registrant-alert-v2-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Advanced registrant alert search
api_list.description: Advanced search lets you define your search term at the WHOIS records' fields level. You can specify terms for all the contact fields. For details see "Advanced search docs" under "Overview".
